Blackstorm:

"He's following a strange bot's signature..."replied Blackstorm while 
she offered a glass with energon "Lately, some enemies bots are in 
our territory... One left quickly the territory, I don't know what 
happen with the other two... Drink this, you need it "



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/18/03 10:49:11 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackstorm looked to Maxima, she seemed that she was ready to 
attack 
> > her but she didn't felt fear. She smiled and said "You should 
better 
> > keep  your strengt"said firmly but with a polite tone "I'm not a 
> > treat, I'm a Predacon as you, I'm Blackstorm... I'm Perceptor's 
> > assistant"
> > 
> 
> Maxima only gazed at Blackstorm. She never knew Blackstorm as the 
Autobot 
> Nightlight. But there was still something about Blackstorm that 
made her 
> uneasy. For the time being. Of course, Maxima was leery of many 
until she 
> knew them. That's just the way she was. Functioning for many 
millenia, one 
> had to watch their back to survive. 
> 
> Her optics slightly dimmed. Bording unconsciousness once more. The 
healing 
> was not working. 
> 
> Maxima struggled with what energy she had. Sitting up, she removed 
herself 
> weakly & slowly from the CR.  
> 
> Leaning against the CR, she looked up at Blackstorm. "Where is... 
Perceptor?" 
> she breathed hoarsely.
